news_header: A BBC investigation reveals that Shell has ignored warnings about corruption and problems in a clean-up operation in southern Nigeria, where oil pollution has devastated communities. Despite Shell and the Nigerian government claiming progress, evidence suggests the clean-up has been ineffective. A civil trial is set to begin, where affected communities will hold Shell accountable for pollution from 1989 to 2020.
news_original_title: Oil clean-up 'scam' warnings ignored by Shell, whistleblower tells BBC
news_text: The UN has reported severe health risks and environmental damage due to oil spills in the region, with local residents suffering from contaminated water and loss of livelihoods.
